mapper.select: SELECT MAX(TEMP.type) type,TEMP.USER_ID FROM ( SELECT USER_ID,'2' type FROM abnormal where (ERROR_TYPE = 'PR013012') and (abnormal.occurrence_date <= NOW() and abnormal.FINISHED_DATE >= NOW() or (YEAR(abnormal.occurrence_date) = YEAR(NOW()) and MONTH(abnormal.occurrence_date) = MONTH(NOW())) or (YEAR(abnormal.FINISHED_DATE) = YEAR(NOW()) and MONTH(abnormal.FINISHED_DATE) = MONTH(NOW()))) UNION ALL SELECT USER_ID,'3' type FROM abnormal where (ERROR_TYPE = 'PR013013') and (abnormal.occurrence_date <= NOW() and abnormal.FINISHED_DATE >= NOW() or (YEAR(abnormal.occurrence_date) = YEAR(NOW()) and MONTH(abnormal.occurrence_date) = MONTH(NOW())) or (YEAR(abnormal.FINISHED_DATE) = YEAR(NOW()) and MONTH(abnormal.FINISHED_DATE) = MONTH(NOW()))) ) TEMP GROUP BY TEMP.USER_ID
